headline: Why NRG Energy (NRG) is a Top Value Stock for the Long-Term
summary: The Zacks Style Scores offers investors a way to easily find top-rated stocks based on their investing style. Here's why you should take advantage.

raw.headline: Why NRG Energy (NRG) is a Top Value Stock for the Long-Term

headline: Is It Worth Investing in NRG (NRG) Based on Wall Street's Bullish Views?
summary: According to the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), one should invest in NRG (NRG). It is debatable whether this highly sought-after metric is effective because Wall Street analysts' recommendations tend to be overly optimistic. Would it be worth investing in the stock?
